StringHelper::basename.description: Returns the trailing name component of a path.

StringHelper::byteLength.description: Returns the number of bytes in the given string.

StringHelper::byteSubstr.description: Returns the portion of string specified by the start and length parameters.

StringHelper::endsWith.description: Check if given string ends with specified substring.

StringHelper::explode.description: Explodes string into array, optionally trims values and skips empty ones

StringHelper::startsWith.description: Check if given string starts with specified substring.

StringHelper::truncate.description: Truncates a string to the number of characters specified.

StringHelper::truncateHtml.description: Truncate a string while preserving the HTML.

StringHelper::truncateWords.description: Truncates a string to the number of words specified.
